AssetType.name: AssetType
AssetType.description: Represents a type of asset, such as a type of item, physical space, or service offering.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the asset type.

Description.description: The description of the asset type.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the asset type is active (true) or not (false).

IsAvailableToSchedule.description: Indicates whether the use of assets associated with the asset type can be scheduled (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Required. The name of the asset type record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the record.

ParentId.description: The parent asset type associated with the record. Use a parent record to define a relationship between an asset type and an asset subtype.
